definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: Aramark has provided catering services at 13 previous Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 爱玛客曾为13届奥运会提供过服务。

sentences.english: Emma saw its artifice, and returned to her first surmises.
sentences.chinese: 爱玛看穿了她的伎俩，又回到了原先的猜疑上。

sentences.english: The doctor said Emma is developing very well.
sentences.chinese: 主任医生说，爱玛长的很好。

sentences.english: Emma never arrives punctually so you can expect to be waiting.
sentences.chinese: 爱玛是从不准时赴约的，你就做好等的准备吧。

sentences.english: Emma could now imagine why her own attentions had been slighted.
sentences.chinese: 爱玛现在想象得出，为什么她的关心屡屡受到轻慢。

sentences.english: How Jane could bear it at all, was astonishing to Emma.
sentences.chinese: 简怎么能受得了这一切，真叫爱玛感到吃惊。

sentences.english: In this walk Emma and Mr. Weston found all the others assembled;
sentences.chinese: 爱玛和韦斯顿先生发现，别人全都聚集在这条路上。

sentences.english: Mr. Wilkerson, I've just come from Emmy Slattery 's bedside.
sentences.chinese: 伟基信先生，我刚从爱玛的住处回来。

sentences.english: Are you well, my Emma?' was Mrs. Weston's parting question.
sentences.chinese: “你身体好吗，爱玛？”韦斯顿太太临别时问道。

sentences.english: Emma is a member of a drama club. She seems to enjoy acting.
sentences.chinese: 爱玛是话剧俱乐部的演员，她就像对表演倍感兴趣。

sentences.english: Emma saw how Mr. Weston understood these joyous prospects.
sentences.chinese: 爱玛看出了韦斯顿先生是怎样领会这喜幸的前景的。

sentences.english: Aramark's first Olympics was Mexico City in 1968.
sentences.chinese: 爱玛客首次参与奥运会是在1968年的墨西哥城。

sentences.english: The intermediate month was the one fixed on, as far as they dared, by Emma and Mr.
sentences.chinese: 爱玛和奈特利先生只敢把婚期定在十月份。

sentences.english: The tender love scenes Behind the footlights made Emma Breathless with envy.
sentences.chinese: 戏台上那些情意绵绵的爱情场面使爱玛为之神往。

sentences.english: Phoebe: I just can't decide who she looks more alike, you or Rachel?
sentences.chinese: 你说爱玛长得像你还是像瑞秋多一些？

sentences.english: Harriet was remembered only from being her friend.
sentences.chinese: 他所以惦着哈丽特，仅仅因为她是她爱玛的朋友。

definition: Elizabeth/also written 伊麗莎白|伊丽莎白
